role_dependencies: Ensures Homebrew is installed on Linux and MacOS systems
role_description: An Ansible role that installs pgcli (a Postgres CLI) on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [pgcli](https://github.com/dbcli/pgcli) is a free and open-source CLI for Postgres that does auto-completion and syntax highlighting.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs pgcli (a Postgres CLI) on nearly any platform.
